DOC.detailed_description: It double-blind , single center , randomize , crossover adaptive study design 7 arm . The subject submit 7 test ingestion high-protein meal replacement ( test meal ) randomize order preferably week apart . The 7 test meal isocaloric , isonitrogenous differ protein quality .
